ygData.subject: How do I get off this list?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Like a bone head I forgot how to get off this email list. Can anyone tell me?  I play a Shaman now, because I got sick of massive Bard hate and dying all
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, Like a bone head I forgot how to get off this email list. Can anyone
tell me? I play a Shaman now, because I got sick of massive Bard hate and
dying all the time from being to close to a party fighting a mob that for
some reason decided my little bard was more of a threat than the 6 level 20+
people pounding on it.
I loved the list though, And wish everyone luck.
Talonstar <retired> Wandering minstrel of E'ci
Boss Ogre Shaman of Eci
Greggor, Shaman of justice, Vallon Zek, Guild of the Seventh Tower
